articles.title: Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Releases Crucial Report
articles.content:
Command of Southwestern Front of KPA Releases Crucial Report
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Command of the Southwestern Front of the Korean People's Army (KPA) releases the following crucial report on Thursday:
					 On Thursday the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military committed such a grave military provocation as firing shells at the waters of the DPRK side from the waters around Yonphyong Island without any prior notice.
					
					 This reckless military provocation is an undisguised revelation of their sinister design to ignite a war against the DPRK by deliberately making a clumsy fire on its inviolable territorial waters. This is fully evidenced by the recent situation prevailing in the hot spot of the West Sea of Korea.
					
					 The intrusion into the territorial waters of the DPRK side being perpetrated by warships of the puppet army under the pretext of intercepting fishing boats is escalating day by day and there continues day and night the mad-cap firing and shelling on Paekryong, Yonphyong, Taechong and other islands.
					
					 In order to cope with the prevailing situation, all the strike groups of the KPA in the southwestern sector of the front rounded off preparations for devastating strike after having a complete retaliatory posture.
					
					 We clearly know that not only the puppet Ministry of Defense but also Chongwadae are behind the reckless clumsy firing perpetrated by the bellicose forces of the south Korean puppet military in the most sensitive waters.
					
					 Park Geun Hye and her group finding themselves in the worst ruling crisis and being driven into a pitfall of destiny are working hard to seek a way out by desperately perpetrating provocations in the hotspot waters and pushing the situation to the brink of a war.
					
					 All the service personnel of the KPA in the southwestern sector of the front are full of the strong will of retaliation to punish the provocateurs to the last one by giving vent to their pent-up grudge.
					
					 What they are waiting for is only the order to be given by the Supreme Command to strike the provocateurs.
					
					 The provocateurs will have to keenly realize what high price they will pay for the consequences to be entailed by their reckless clumsy firing.

articles.title: Some European Countries Accused of Finding Fault with DPRK over Issue of Armistice Supervisory Mechanism
articles.content:
Some European Countries Accused of Finding Fault with DPRK over Issue of Armistice Supervisory Mechanism
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Some countries toeing the U.S. line recently dared find fault with the DPRK over the issue of the long defunct Armistice supervisory mechanism.
					 The spokesman for the Panmunjom Mission of the Korean People's Army gave the following answer to the question put by the newspaper Joson Inmingun on Thursday in this regard:
					
					 Some days ago, representatives of central European countries flew into Seoul to hold "high-level meeting on political affairs". 
					
					 We do not know by whose entreaty and for what reason they went so busy in such sweltering weather and we do not care at all. 
					
					 However, we cannot overlook their reckless behavior of groundlessly finding fault with the DPRK and letting loose invectives, unsuitable to the time and place and not befitting their positions. 
					
					 They styling themselves high-level politicians of the "Four Nations Consultative Council" of Europe held a press conference at which they started to talk about the "Neutral Nations Supervisory Commission" all of a sudden. 
					
					 They claimed that this mechanism which was formed with the mission to supervise and control the introduction and reinforcement of military personnel and arms and equipment from outside Korea according to the Korean Armistice Agreement, seemed to disappear for form's sake but it still exists and is functioning. 
					
					 They also asserted in their own way that in the light of its existence it shows international community's concern over the Korean peninsula being "a dangerous powder magazine." When the audience queried what is the need to talk about the "Neutral Nations Supervisory Commission" forgotten by the people long ago, they answered its "symbolic meaning was very important". 
					
					 It is needless to ask why they tried so hard to recognize the existence of the mechanism with keen interest. 
					
					 They unhesitatingly revealed their ulterior intention to force the DPRK to "dismantle" nukes and show "sincere will for changes" if the constant tension is to be defused on the Korean peninsula. It was just the same as the U.S. assertion, though it sounded different outwardly. 
					
					 The politicians who pulled up the DPRK this time were guys of the former member nations of the "Neutral Nations Supervisory Commission".
					
					 They must know better than anyone else that the commission is forgotten in history because it was reduced to a servant of the U.S. in its moves for invading the DPRK and abandoned the principle of neutrality and fairness, different from its original mission. 
					
					 They were to blame for rendering the mechanism defunct, subservient to the U.S. without any elementary principle. It is more than two decades since then but they are behaving so ridiculously not feeling any shame, passing the buck for the tension on the peninsula to the DPRK. They should pay without fail for their criminal acts of nullifying the Armistice Agreement and rendering the supervisory mechanism defunct, pursuant to the U.S. scenario of aggression against the DPRK.
					
					 People ridicule them for becoming poor trumpeters for the U.S. anti-DPRK campaign.
					
					 They, at the same time, see through the petty trick of the U.S. to revive the supervisory mechanism by bringing together riff-raffs on the occasion of June 25. 
					
					 No one on earth can prevail over justice and truth. 
					
					 We would like to politely advise those poor trumpeters bribed by the U.S.
					
					 They should regard their dignity as dear as their lives and always uphold justice against injustice if they have an iota of reason. 
					
					 They should not behave like a marionette. 
					
					 No one can hurt the dignity of the DPRK racing against time full of dynamism. 
					
					 The U.S. should face up to this stark reality and give up the stupid attempt to revive the supervisory mechanism. 
					
					 It would be well advised to seriously look back on what miserable fate the Korean war brought to the U.S. and what disastrous consequences were entailed by the moves for aggression against the DPRK pursued by the U.S. in the subsequent period. 
					
					 It is the steadfast stand of the Korean People's Army that there will be no word "ceasefire" in the final standoff with the U.S.
					
					 The U.S. and its allies should always remember this.

articles.title: 5th Meeting of North-South Joint Commission for KIZ Held
articles.content:
5th Meeting of North-South Joint Commission for KIZ Held
 Kaesong, June 26 (KCNA) -- The 5th meeting of the north-south joint commission for the Kaesong Industrial Zone (KIZ) took place in the zone.
					 The meeting was held, divided into a plenary session and contact between the heads of delegations from the north and the south.
					
					 At the meeting the north side clarified its stand on the principled and important issues to be primarily settled for normalization of the operation in the KIZ and discussed some other matters with the south side.
					
					 The two sides decided to continue the discussion in the future.

articles.title: Greetings to Mauritanian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Mauritanian President
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Wednesday sent a congratulatory message to Mohamed Ould Abdel Aziz upon his reelection as president of Mauritania.
					 The message expressed belief that the historic and traditional friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger, sincerely wishing the president of Mauritania bigger success in his responsible work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russians
articles.content:
Gifts to Kim Jong Un from Russians 
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un was presented with gifts by Mikhail Demskov, editor-in-chief of the Russian newspaper Patriot, and Utehin, general director of the Nizhny Novgorod "Favorit-NN" Co. Ltd., of Russia.
					 The editor-in-chief and the general director conveyed the gifts to the DPRK ambassador to Russia and an official of the DPRK working in Russia on June 6 and 18.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Central Military Orchestra
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Central Military Orchestra
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the visiting central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defence of the Russian Federation.
					 Chief Conductor Valery Khalilov, head of the military-orchestra service of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, handed the gift to an official concerned of the DPRK on Thursday.

articles.title: Russian Central Military Orchestra Gives Its Premiere
articles.content:
Russian Central Military Orchestra Gives Its Premiere 
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The visiting central military orchestra of the Ministry of Defense of the Russian Federation gave its premiere at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre on Thursday.
					 Lieut. General Ryom Chol Song, Col. General Kim Hyong Ryong, Han Chol, vice-minister of Culture, and service personnel of the Korean People's Army enjoyed the performance.
					
					 Among the audience were Russian Ambassador to the DPRK Alexandr Timonin and staff members of his embassy, foreign diplomatic envoys and military attaches, and their spouses. 
					
					 Put on the stage were works showing the appearance of the national art of Russia and the life and custom of the Russian people.
					
					 Female solo "Blue Handkerchief" and "Katyusha" depicting optimistic life and noble spiritual world of the soldiers of the Red Army and patriotic people who defeated the fascist aggressors and defended their motherland were acclaimed by the audience for their individual enthusiastic representation. 
					
					 Conspicuous are saxophone solo "Chardash", trombone solo "Black Eyeball" and male solo "Long Way". 
					
					 In Korean songs "Song of Comradeship" and "Attraction and Reverence" the performers sang high praises of the boundless reverence for President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 Wind instrument music "Friendship Waltz" composed by Chief Conductor Valery Khalilov, head of the military-orchestra service of the Armed Forces of the Russian Federation, reached the climax of the performance to be acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					 The performance goes on. 
					
					That evening the Ministry of People's Armed Forces hosted a banquet for the orchestra.

articles.title: Provincial Mass Rallies Held
articles.content:
Provincial Mass Rallies Held
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Mass rallies took place in South Phyongan, South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces on Thursday on the occasion of the day of struggle against U.S. imperialism which falls on June 25.
					 Present there were officials of the local party, power and economic organs and working organizations, people of all social strata, youth and students.
					
					 Speeches were made at the rallies.
					
					 Speakers condemned the U.S. imperialists for igniting the Korean war of aggression and imposing disastrous misfortune and calamities on the Korean nation 64 years ago and trying to unleash a new war.
					
					 They went on:
					
					 The past Fatherland Liberation War was a grim revolutionary war in which the DPRK firmly defended the freedom and independence of the country and the gains of the revolution from the armed invasion by the enemy. The U.S. imperialists committed inhuman crimes unprecedented in the world war history.
					
					 The historic victory in the Fatherland Liberation War was the shining victory of the outstanding military idea, Juche-based war method and superb strategy and tactics of President Kim Il Sung and the victory of the burning patriotism and indomitable fighting spirit of the army and people of the DPRK who waged a heroic struggle, rallied firm around the party and the leader.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are working hard to ignite a new war with bloodshot eyes, far from drawing a lesson from the disgraceful defeat they suffered in the Korean war though many years have passed since they signed the surrender document.
					
					 We will wipe out the U.S. imperialist aggressors, the sworn enemies, and the south Korean puppet forces to the last man, accomplish the historic cause of national reunification, accelerate the building of a thriving socialist nation and thus accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche.
					
					 Then followed anti-U.S. demos.

articles.title: Class Education Intensified in DPRK
articles.content:
Class Education Intensified in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A brisk work is going on in the DPRK to raise class consciousness among the younger generations with the day of anti-U.S. struggle (June 25) as an occasion.
					 The class education helps the young people have an bitter hatred toward the exploiting classes and harden their will to protect the interests of the working masses and the gains of socialism as well as not to pardon those who dare slander the dignity and the social system of the DPRK and its line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					
					 According to Kan Ok Ryon, an official of the C.C., Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the anti-U.S. education has been conducted in various forms and methods at schools across the country, including Kim Il Sung University, Kim Chaek University of Technology and Pyongyang University of Architecture. 
					
					 The youth league officials in different parts of the country went among the working youths to inform of the untold misfortune and sufferings imposed by the U.S. imperialists on the Korean nation during the last Korean War and the vicious anti-DPRK war moves of the Park Geun Hye group in south Korea.
					
					 The league organizations at all levels organized frequent visits to the class education places such as the National House of Class Education and the Sinchon Museum while concentrating on the education through data displayed in class education rooms.
					
					 Also, meetings of various forms are held at worksites to invoke vengeance on the U.S. imperialists and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors.

articles.title: New Species of Crataegus Pinnatifida Cultivated in DPRK
articles.content:
New Species of Crataegus Pinnatifida Cultivated in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Thremmatology Institute under the Academy of Forestry in the DPRK has recently cultivated a new species of crataegus pinnatifida.
					 The fruit of crataegus pinnatifida is known as raw material for the food industry as it is rich in nutrients, including organic acid and vitamin C. It also serves as Koryo medicine efficacious for cardioneurosis, stenocardia and rheumatic myocarditis.
					
					 The institute solved the technical problems arising in breeding and cultivating the new species to raise it in a big way across the country.
					
					 The new species grows 7-8 meters high, and its fruit is 1.4 times higher in the rate of pap and twice in content of water-soluble sugar, as compared with other species of crataegus pinnatifida. The fruit is generally 1.8-2 times bigger in size and its yield per hectare 3-3.8 times higher and abundant in medicinal components good for heart, 115-120 times those of other species.
					
					 This tree can be also used as a garden plant for its good shape.

articles.title: New Tin-free Bearing Alloy Developed in DPRK
articles.content:
New Tin-free Bearing Alloy Developed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Wonsan University of Fisheries in the DPRK developed tin-free bearing alloy (8 components), which can be substituted for tin bearing alloy (babbit-83).
					 The alloy is used as material of sleeve bearing for marine engine, driving shaft of electric locomotive, big generator and motor, rolling mill, crusher and other machines.
					
					 Hwang Chol Man, one of its developers, told KCNA:
					
					 The research group of the university developed tin-free bearing alloys (6 components and 7 components), superior to tin bearing alloy (babbit-83) in technical property, in the 1980s and early 1990s, which won invention diplomas and medals at the international exhibition of inventions and new technologies and other international exhibitions.
					
					 On this basis, the group produced a new kind of tin-free bearing alloy with eight components, better than the existing alloys in mechanical property.
					
					 This alloy is 5 times less in abrasion rate, 2.5 times higher in adhesion, 2.3 times higher in strength and 1.7 times stronger in heat resistance than tin bearing alloy (babbit-83).
					
					 It has been already introduced to different fields of the national economy, proving its big effect.

articles.title: Rainy Season Likely to Begin in DPRK
articles.content:
Rainy Season Likely to Begin in DPRK
						
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The seasonal rainy front is now staying above the area in latitude 30 degrees north.
					 The rainy front slightly moved above the coastal area of South Sea of Korea from June 17 to 21, causing the first rainfall in Jeju Island, South Jolla and South Kyongsang provinces.
					
					 Weather experts forecast that the front will weaken for a while, staying in the present position, and then gain force in early July, gradually moving northward.
					
					 The rainy season in the DPRK is expected to begin between July 5 and 15 this year.
					
					 Rainy season begins mostly on July 4 in the country.

articles.title: 23rd Congress of Korean Youth League in Japan Held
articles.content:
23rd Congress of Korean Youth League in Japan Held
 Tokyo, June 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- The 23rd Congress of the Korean Youth League in Japan (Jochong) was held at Korea University under the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) on June 22.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, Kim Cha Dol, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the league, and other deputies.
					
					 A congratulatory message sent by Marshal Kim Jong Un to the 23rd Congress of Chongryon was read out at the congress.
					
					 Congratulatory message sent by the C.C., the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and different units of the homeland and those sent by the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan and the Children's Union of Tokyo Korea First Junior Secondary School were introduced.
					
					 Kim Cha Dol in a report said that in the period under review Jochong has firmly consolidated it into the ranks of loyalty and give full play to the spirit of loving the country, compatriots and future and its members have conducted positive activities as the masters of the patriotic movement.
					
					 He referred to the tasks to carry through the decision of the 23rd Congress of Chongryon.
					
					 Personages of Japanese youth organizations made speeches of solidarity and officials of Jochong organizations at all levels spoke at the congress.
					
					 Deputy Kim Yong Ju was elected chairman of the Central Standing Committee of Jochong at the congress.
					
					 Then followed a speech of Nam Sung U. He hoped that Jochong would conduct viable and positive activities to strengthen the movement of Korean youth in Japan in the glorious era of Kim Jong Un to a new heyday.
					
					 A letter to Kim Jong Un was read out at the congress.
					
					 At the end of the congress there took place the first meeting of the 23rd Central Committee of the Jochong.

articles.title: U.S. Imperialists Censured for Igniting Korean War
articles.content:
U.S. Imperialists Censured for Igniting Korean War
 Tokyo, June 25 (KNS-KCNA) -- Officials of organizations of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon) made public statements 64 years since the U.S. imperialists ignited the Korean war.
					 Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, said the U.S. shipped huge weapons for aggression into south Korea after Korea's liberation and prodded Syngman Rhee into igniting the war.
					
					 Kim Yong Ju, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Youth League in Japan, noted the U.S. has not yet abandoned its foolish ambition to swallow up the whole Korean peninsula but is staging ceaseless joint military exercises against the DPRK to spark off bigger resentment of the Korean youth and students in Japan.
					
					 Kang Chu Ryon, chairwoman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Democratic Women's Union in Japan, expressed the will to arouse all Korean women in Japan to the movement for national reunification, saying that the Korean women in Japan will disclose the crimes of the U.S. imperialists and thoroughly reject the crimes of the south Korean puppet forces against the nation and reunification.
					
					 Kim Hwa Hyo, chairperson of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan, said it is due to the U.S. that Korea has not yet been reunified, military tensions and threat of a nuclear war are constantly remaining on the Korean peninsula and the inter-Korean relations are being driven into the worst catastrophic phase.
					
					 Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Union of Korean Students in Japan, expressed the will to wage a positive struggle to fully support the south Korean youth and students in their struggle to shatter the war moves of the U.S. and the puppet forces and achieve the independent reunification of the country.

articles.title: Koreans in China Censure U.S. Imperialists for Igniting Korean War
articles.content:
Koreans in China Censure U.S. Imperialists for Igniting Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China held a meeting in Shenyang, China on June 24 to denounce the U.S. imperialists for igniting the Korean war of aggression.
					 Present at the meeting were Chairwoman Choe Un Bok and other officials of the general association and Hwang Yong Du, chairman of the Liaoning regional association.
					
					  Disclosed at the meeting were data on the crimes perpetrated by the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 Choe Un Bok said: The Korean war was the one for aggression ignited by the U.S. to stifle the young DPRK and realize its ambition for world domination, and a war of genocide against the Korean nation unprecedented in the world war history.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists are putting south Korea under their military control, tightening the noose of domination and subordination over south Korea and revealing the hostile policy towards the DPRK and ambition for invading it. The U.S. remains unchanged in its aggressive nature and it is getting more vicious day by day.
					
					 The south Korean puppet group of traitors is persisting in the showdown with the compatriots in the north and war moves against it as war servants for the U.S. going reckless to impose calamities of a nuclear war upon the Korean nation.
					
					 The whole Korean nation should together with the world peace-loving people expose before the world the barbarous atrocities committed by the U.S. imperialists in the Korean war and launch a dynamic struggle to smash the ambition of the U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppet forces for invading the DPRK.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Stage War Maneuvers
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Warmongers Stage War Maneuvers 
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The warmongers of the south Korean puppet marine corps on June 25 staged the frantic war maneuvers for aggression in the coastal areas of the East and West Seas of Korea which reminded one of the June 25 Korean war.
					 The puppet 1st Marine Division conducted a drill for examining an emergency action in the coastal areas including Phohang and Kyongju, North Kyongsang Province.
					
					 The warmongers swiftly moved all firepower means of the unit at the same time as the U.S. imperialists instigated puppet Syngman Rhee to ignite the all-out war against the DPRK.
					
					 Meanwhile, the puppet Marine Corps of south Korea kicked off a war drill for invading the north on the five islands of the West Sea including Paekryong Island that day. The warmongers staged naval firing drills on Paekryong and Taechong islands. They also drove islanders into a drill for taking shelter under the simulated condition of the start of a war.
					
					 The reckless war rackets go to clearly prove once again that the puppet group is the very one who provoked the June 25 Korean war  at the instigation of the U.S. imperialists, and maniacs keen on the moves to ignite a war on this land again.

articles.title: U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Igniting Korean War
articles.content:
U.S., S. Korean Puppet Forces Slammed for Igniting Korean War
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The General Association of Koreans in China issued a statement on June 24 denouncing the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces for igniting the Korean war for aggression.
					 64 years have passed since the U.S. imperialists prodded the south Korean puppet forces into invading the peaceful DPRK all of a sudden at dawn of June 25, 1950 and imposed disastrous war calamites upon it, the statement said.
					
					 The Korean war was the one for aggression ignited by the U.S. imperialists to stifle the young DPRK and the unheard-of war of genocide in the war history of the world, it charged.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists, far from drawing a due lesson in the past Korean war since they signed the Armistice Agreement with their knees bent before the army and people of the DPRK, have persisted in the moves to unleash a new war with their ambition for invading it, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The Park Geun Hye group of traitors is the sycophant and quisling without an equal in the world as it is gravely threatening the dignity and sovereignty of the nation, leaving even the right to command the wartime operation to the mercy of the U.S. as its war servant, indifferent to the interests of the nation.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' ambition for aggression to obliterate the DPRK and swallow up the whole Korean peninsula remains unchanged.
					
					 The General Association of Koreans in China and all Koreans in China will together with the people in the homeland resolutely reject the moves of the U.S. going reckless to inflict disaster of a nuclear war on the Korean nation and the moves of the Park Geun Hye group for escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen and war rackets and more dynamically wage the struggle for defending peace against the U.S. and war.

articles.title: U.S., Chieftain of Aggression and War, Censured
articles.content:
U.S., Chieftain of Aggression and War, Censured
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Information Bureau of the Central Committee of the Anti-Imperialist National Democratic Front (AINDF) issued a statement titled "We denounce U.S., chieftain of aggression and war" on June 24, according to internet website Kuguk Jonson.
					 The June 25 Korean war ignited by the U.S. in pursuance of its interests from A to Z was the brigandish war of aggression and the war of genocide, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The war caused incurable wounds to the Korean nation along with the territorial partition.
					
					 The war and massacres perpetrated by the aggressors are being beautified and the defeat in the war is being labeled as "victory" in south Korea.
					
					 The U.S. and pro-U.S. conservative forces are unhesitatingly staging such shameless farces as "commemoration ceremony" and the like by inviting satellite countries which were used as a cannon fodder of the war while branding the June 25 war as "southward provocation by the north".
					
					 This is an act against the nation and history as it was prompted from the vicious scheme of the U.S. and the present conservative authorities of south Korea to conceal their true colors as the despicable aggressors and war provokers, distort the truth about the war of aggression perpetrated by them, escalate confrontation with the DPRK and intensify war rackets.
					
					 The statement expressed belief that all the patriotic forces hoping for the people's security and the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula would get firmly united and turn out as one in the death-defying resistance to resolutely shatter the moves of the U.S., the empire of evils, and the belligerent group of Park Geun Hye, pro-U.S. traitor, to ignite the second Korean war.

articles.title: Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
articles.content:
Congratulatory Visits Paid to DPRK Embassies
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Personages of Nepal, Bangladesh and Myanmar visited the DPRK embassies in their countries in the period between June 19 and 21 in congratulation of the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Nepal (Marxist-Leninist), chairperson of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (United), general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Bangladesh, president of the Bangladesh People's League, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of Songun Politics and the director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute.
					
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and full-length paintings depicting them standing together.

articles.title: Collection of Kim Jong Un's Works off Press in Mexico
articles.content:
Collection of Kim Jong Un's Works off Press in Mexico
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A collection of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's works "Forward towards Final Victory" was brought out by the Publishing House of the Workers' Party of Mexico on June 19.
					 It edits "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and Our People", "Let Us Brilliantly Accomplish the Revolutionary Cause of Juche, Holding Kim Jong Il in High Esteem as the Eternal General Secretary of Our Party", "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" and other works.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Romania
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work off Press in Romania
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Add Eternal Brilliance to Comrade Kim Jong Il's Great Idea and Achievements of the Songun Revolution" was brought out in booklet by a publishing house of Romania on June 17.
					 The talk, published on August 25, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the Songun revolutionary leadership feats of Kim Jong Il and clarifies the essence and originality of the Songun revolutionary idea and the tasks to successfully accomplish the revolutionary cause of Songun.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung to Be Remembered in Uganda
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- A committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Il Sung was formed at the building of the Secretariat of the Uganda National Resistance Movement on June 18.
					 Kirunda Kivejinja, senior adviser to the Ugandan president, was elected adviser to the committee, and Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency, chairman of the committee.
					
					 It decided to arrange colorful political and cultural events to commemorate the 20th anniversary of demise of the President.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Personages of Uganda
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Feats Lauded by Personages of Uganda
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Henri Masico, department director of the Presidency of Uganda, and the chairman of the Ugandan National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea lauded feats of President Kim Il Sung at the inaugural ceremony of a committee for remembering him held in Uganda on June 18.
					 They said that the President was a great master of ideology and theory who fathered the Juche idea, an elder statesman who developed the DPRK into a world power and made a great contribution to the human cause of independence and an iron-willed commander who defeated U.S. and Japanese imperialism in one generation.
					
					 His feats will be always remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives, they noted.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by British Organization
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association issued a statement on June 14 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement said:
					
					 Comrade Kim Jong Il, the great leader of the Korean people, started work at the C.C., the WPK on June 19, 1964.
					
					 He led the work to eliminate the anti-party, counter-revolutionary forces and uproot all unsound ideological trends including capitalism and revisionism within the party and published famous works such as "On the Juche Idea," thus developing in depth the Juche idea, the guiding idea of the party.
					
					 Working at the C.C., the WPK, he wisely led the work of all fields, including ideology, politics, economy, military affairs and culture.
					
					 He developed the WPK into the mother party taking good care of the people in a responsible manner.
					
					 When socialism collapsed in various countries in the late last century, he made sure that the WPK held higher the red flag of socialism.
					
					 We highly laud the undying feats he performed in leading the WPK.

articles.title: Important Day of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
articles.content:
Important Day of DPRK Commemorated Abroad
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries from June 16 to 18 to mark the 50th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of work at the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 They included a meeting in Denmark and seminars in Egypt, Pakistan and Uganda.
					
					 Displayed on the front walls of the venues of the events were portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Also on display there were photos showing the exploits Kim Jong Il performed by leading the WPK.
					
					 Works of the President, Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un, books and photos showing the true picture of the prospering DPRK were also on show.
					
					 The chairman of the Denmark-DPRK Friendship Association noted in his speech that Kim Jong Il made sure that the monolithic idea based on the Juche idea was firmly established within the WPK and it took the Juche idea as the invariable guiding idea.
					
					 Thanks to his wise leadership, the unity and cohesion of the WPK led to the single-minded unity of the whole society admired by the world.
					
					 The exploits he performed for the times and mankind will be everlasting along with his august name.
					
					 The secretary general of the Pakistan Association for Self-Reliance Studies and other speakers lauded Kim Jong Il for developing the WPK into an invincible revolutionary party and thus making a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the cause of global independence.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the events held in Denmark and Pakistan.

articles.title: Appeal of Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported
articles.content:
Appeal of Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea Supported
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Group of Youth for the Study of Kim Jong Il Juche Idea in Vienna released a statement on June 18 in support of the appeal made by the Asia-Pacific Regional Committee for Supporting Peaceful Reunification of Korea.
					 The statement fully supported the appeal of the regional committee on holding an international internet seminar for widely introducing the undying exploits of HE Kim Il Sung, the eternal President of the DPRK, on the occasion of the 20th anniversary of his demise.
					
					 The seminar will mark an important occasion in widely disseminating the revolutionary ideas of the President and leader Kim Jong Il, the statement said, adding:
					
					 Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism is the most valuable treasure of mankind and the most correct line indicating the road to be followed by the popular masses aspiring after independence.

articles.title: June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Personage of Brazil
articles.content:
June 15 North-South Joint Declaration Observed by Personage of Brazil
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Rosanita Campos, vice-president of the Party for Free Motherland of Brazil, on June 18 contributed an article titled "North-south joint declaration for Korea's reunification" to the newspaper Hora do Povo to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The article said that leader Kim Jong Il opened up a bright prospect for the country's reunification by providing the joint declaration in order to realize national reunification desired by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Introducing the main contents of the declaration, the article went on:
					
					Marshal Kim Jong Un is adding glory to the idea of national reunification and exploits of the President and Kim Jong Il. He is leading the drive to achieve the reunification of the country through mutual understanding of Koreans in the north and the south and dialogue between them, free from interference of outsiders.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations are worsening and a stumbling block is lying in the way of national reunification owing to the anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. and the south Korean puppet authorities.

articles.title: British Organization Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
articles.content:
British Organization Supports June 15 North-South Joint Declaration
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- The Britain-Korea Friendship Association released a statement on June 11 to mark the 14th anniversary of the publication of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					 The June 15 joint declaration is a rainbow bridge of hope to put an end to the Korean division forced by U.S. imperialism and bring about its reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 The declaration fully reflects the will and desire of all Koreans in the north, the south and abroad to achieve the independent and peaceful reunification of the country.
					
					 It was provided thanks to the tireless efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for national reunification.
					
					 The declaration is a striking demonstration of the firm stand and peace-loving policy of the DPRK for independent reunification.
					
					 However, the idea of the declaration is being disavowed by the Park Geun Hye fascist group of puppet south Korea.
					
					 Park is crying out for "unification by absorption" the keynote of which is to topple the socialist system in the DPRK.
					
					 Park attempts to drag even Western forces to the Korean issue after plunging south Korea deeper into subjugation by the U.S. and Japan.
					
					 Park is, indeed, a traitor without an equal in the world.
					
					 We fully support the whole Korean nation in the north, the south and abroad in the struggle to embody the spirit of By Our Nation Itself, the main idea of the June 15 joint declaration.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Teachers Union
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Suppressing Teachers Union
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- As already known, the south Korean puppet Seoul Administrative Court made a ruling that the Teachers Union lost a suit brought by it against the minister of Employment and Labor in demand of the cancellation of the decision to deprive the union of its legal status.
					 The Teachers Union held an emergency meeting of its Central Executive Committee on June 19 at which it announced the program for all-out action against the unreasonable decision. It decided its general guidelines at the meeting of its deputies on June 21. 
					
					 It held a press conference at its head office in Sodaemun District, Seoul on June 23.
					
					 At the press conference the chairman of the Teachers Union termed the deprivation of its qualification as a trade union a violence against labor and undemocratic act.
					
					 Meanwhile, chiefs of 16 city and provincial branches of the Teachers Union are waging actions to legitimize it by joining a hunger strike of its chairman.
					
					 The Solidarity for Progress in a statement on June 19 said it would together with the Teachers Union fight it out to restore the position of the union, have those dismissed reinstated and realize democratic education.
					
					 Voice of People, an internet paper, in an editorial on June 20 condemned the unreasonable decision made by the court.

articles.title: Tropical Birds Settle in Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun
articles.content:
Tropical Birds Settle in Arboretum of Kumsusan Palace of Sun 
 Pyongyang, June 26 (KCNA) -- Tropical birds found their nests in the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun, the sacred temple of the sun, drawing the interest of ornithologists and other people. 
					 Egretta intermedia (Wagler, 1829) and Nycticorax nycticorax (Linnaeus, 1758) were found to have lived in the trees in the Arboretum for several years the number of which has now increased to 1 600, according to the observation by the Zoology Research Institute of the State Academy of Sciences. 
					
					 Those birds originate from the southern areas and live in the marshland in the oriental areas.  
					
					 Renowned ornithologist Pak Rae Bon said that it is a conspicuous phenomenon enriching the bird fauna of Korea that the birds which had lived in the southern sultry tract of wet land built their nests in the Arboretum of the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun. 
					
					 Researchers of the Zoology Research Institute said that different kinds of birds flew to the area near the Palace on the picturesque bank of the River Taedong which has turned into thick woodland of various species of trees and all kinds of flowers.

articles.title: Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom denuncia paises satelites de EE.UU.
articles.content:
Representacion de EPC en Phanmunjom denuncia paises satelites de EE.UU.
 Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- A la pregunta formulada por un periodista de Joson Inmingun en relacion con que unos paises satelites de Estados Unidos nos acusaron atrevidamente refiriendose a la existencia del aparato de supervision del armisticio, desaparecido hace mucho tiempo, el portavoz de la Representacion del Ejercito Popular de Corea en Phanmunjom dio el dia 26 la siguiente respuesta:
					 Unos dias antes, los representantes de los paises de la Europa Media fueron a Seul para sostener una supuesta "reunion de alto rango para los asuntos politicos".
					
					 No tenemos ningun interes en quien les invito  y por que ellos andaban ajetreados en estos dias sofocantes.
					
					 Pero, no podemos pasar por alto el hecho de que ellos lanzaron unas peroratas perversas acusandonos sin fundamento en el tiempo y lugar inadecuados y lejos de sus honores.
					
					 En una entrevista, ellos que se autodenominan como politicos de alto rango del "sistema de consulta de 4 naciones" de Europa, comenzaron a discutir el problema de la "Comision de Supervision de Naciones Neutrales".
					
					 En la ocasion, ellos insistieron en que aunque fue desaparecido formalmente el organismo de inspeccion de armisticio organizado segun el Acuerdo de Armisticio de Corea con la mision de inspeccionar y controlar la introduccion y el aumento de los efectivos y armamentos desde la fuera de Corea, pero efectivamente hay que reconocer que este aparato todavia existe y actua.
					
					 Agregaron a su albedrio que la existencia real de ese aparato demuestra la preocupacion de la sociedad internacional de que la Peninsula Coreana es un "polvorin peligroso".
					
					 A la contrapregunta de la audiencia por que ponian sobre el tapete el problema de esa "comision" ya desaparecida en la mente de las personas, ellos contestaron que es muy importante la "significacion simbolica".
					
					 No vale la pena preguntar a ellos por que trataron de reconocer la existencia del aparato de supervision de armisticio teniendo tanto apego al mismo.
					
					 Es que ellos mismos expusieron su verdadera intencion al decir que para sacar la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana de la coyuntura de tension permanente, la RPDC debe "renunciar" las armas nucleares y mostrar la "voluntad de cambiarse de verdad".
					
					 Tales palabras son identicas a lo que insiste EE.UU.
					
					 Los politiqueros, que acusaron esta vez a la RPDC, son de los paises miembros de la susodicha "comision".
					
					 Ellos saben mas que nadie que ese aparato desaparecio en la historia porque enajenado de su mision original, se ha convertido en el ejecutor de las maniobras agresivas de EE.UU. contra la RPDC faltando a sus principios vitales; la neutralidad e imparcialidad.
					
					 Esos culpables, que causaron el colapso del aparato adulando a EE.UU. y actuando sin criterio propio, tratan de imputar a la RPDC hasta ahora a mas de 20 anos la responsabilidad de la situacion tirante de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					 Hay que pasar sin falta las cuentas del acto criminal de ellos que invalidaron el Acuerdo de Armisticio sumandose al complot de agresion a Corea de EE.UU. y quebraron totalmente el aparato de supervision.
					
					 Las personas se burlan de ellos convertidos en los propagandistas anti-RPDC que trabajan para EE.UU.
					
					 Se percatan tambien de la artimana de EE.UU. para rehabilitar el aparato movilizando a los fulanos y menganos con motivo del 25 de junio.
					
					 Nadie puede estar por encima de la justicia y la verdad.
					
					 Aprovechamos esta oportunidad para aconsejar a los que se portan como propagandistas pagados por EE.UU.
					
					 Deben considerar su dignidad como vida y luchar por la justicia y contra la injusticia, si tienen un pedazo de conciencia.
					
					 No deben actuar como espantapajaros que se deja mover de un lado a la otra segun la direccion del viento.
					
					 Nadie puede manchar la imagen impetuosa de la RPDC que marcha con el vigor de juventud acortando el tiempo.
					
					 Al ver esa realidad, EE.UU. debe dejar su absurdo intento de rehabilitar el ya desaparecido aparato de supervision.
					
					 Si tiene tiempo, debera recordar seriamente cuan tragico fue el destino de EE.UU. en la guerra del 25 de junio de 1950 y cuales consecuencias se emanaron sus maniobras de agresion a Corea cometidas despues de aquel dia.
					
					 No habra ni el armisticio en la inminente batalla final de enfrentamiento con EE.UU., esto es la invariable posicion del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					 EE.UU. y sus satelites no deben inolvidarlo ni un momento.

articles.title: Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios en provincias
articles.content:
Tienen lugar mitines multitudinarios en provincias 
 Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- Con motivo del dia de lucha antiyanqui-25 de junio, tuvieron lugar el dia 26 los mitines multitudinarios en las provincias de Phyong-an del Sur, Hamgyong del Sur y Ryanggang. 
					 Participaron los funcionarios de los organismos locales del partido y el poder, instituciones economicas y entidades de masas y los trabajadores, jovenes y estudiantes. 
					
					 En los mitines hubo discursos. 
					
					 Los oradores condenaron a los imperialistas norteamericanos que hace 64 anos provocaron la guerra de agresion contra el sagrado territorio coreano y acarrearon incontables desgracias y sufrimientos a la nacion coreana y ahora se desesperan por desatar otra nueva guerra. 
					
					 La Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue una ardua contienda revolucionaria para defender la libertad y la independencia de la patria y las conquistas de la revolucion desde la invasion armada de los enemigos, dijeron y revelaron que en la pasada guerra coreana el imperialismo norteamericano cometio los crimenes de lesa humanidad no vistos en la historia de guerra. 
					
					 La historica victoria en la Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria fue el triunfo de la destacada idea militar, autoctonos metodos de combate y diestras estrategias y tacticas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el triunfo del indoblegable espiritu de lucha y ardiente patriotismo del ejercito y pueblo coreanos que combatieron con valentia uniendose en torno al partido y al lider, destacaron. 
					
					 Continuaron que ya paso mucho tiempo desde cuando el imperialismo yanqui firmo el Acuerdo de Armisticio, pero se aferra todavia a las maniobras de provocacion de nueva guerra sin sacar la leccion merecida en su derrota vergonzosa sufrida en la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					 Manifestaron la decision de aniquilar a los invasores norteamericanos, enemigos jurados del pueblo coreano, y a los titeres surcoreanos y cumplir la historica causa de reunificacion de la patria y acelerar la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista para llevar a feliz termino la causa revolucionaria del Juche.
					
					 Acto seguido, hubo manifestaciones antiyanquis.

articles.title: ACNC comenta disparate del nuevo presidente de Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
ACNC comenta disparate del nuevo presidente de Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea
 Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- En su discurso de felicitacion pronunciado en la ceremonia inaugural de la Conferencia Mundial de Periodistas 2014, el nuevo presidente de la "Asamblea Nacional" del Sur de Corea, Jong Ui Hwa, dijo que "la Republica de Corea unificada sera pais pacifista y Estado desnuclearizado y abierto".
					 Cuestionando la maxima dignidad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, chismeo que despues de la unificacion, "perdonara por el estilo de Mandela" y "hara al Norte optar por el camino de reconciliacion".
					
					 Esta chismografia es el peor de muchos disparates registrados en la historia de division nacional tales como la "confrontacion" con la RPDC y la "unificacion mediante la fusion de regimenes".
					
					 Hasta los connotados elementos conflictivos como Lee Myung Bak no se atrevieron a insultar en ese tono la maxima dignidad y regimen de la RPDC.
					
					 El reciente disparate de Jong Ui Hwa significa la negativa total a la connacional RPDC, la demostracion de la ambicion sobre la "unificacion mediante la absorcion" y la declaracion de confrontacion de regimenes del Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					
					 La "Republica de Corea", mencionada por Jong, es la copia del nombre de la dinastia feudal de Corea en su periodo final que resulto arruinada por haber practicado el servilismo a grandes potencias.
					
					 El Sur de Corea es colonia de EE.UU. que entrego a este imperio hasta el mando militar, simbolo principal de Estado soberano. 
					
					 Todos los aparatos del Estado como gobierno, asamblea nacional y ejercito son sirvientes coloniales de EE.UU.
					
					 Sin embargo, Jong abogo por la "Republica de Corea unificada" diciendo que "la Asamblea Nacional debe esforzarse por dar esperanza al pueblo presentando la doctrina de 'Thong-il Taebak' (cajon de tesoros para unificacion) y la Declaracion de Dresden".
					
					 Este hecho deja conocer su sucia naturaleza de maniaco de confrontacion y adulon a la "princesa de Yusin" (Park Geun-hye).
					
					 Su intento de poner nombre de "Republica de Corea" al pais reunificado es intolerable acto vendepatria encaminado a convertir nuevamente el pais en colonia.
					
					 Sobre todo, preconizar el supuesto "perdon" y "reconciliacion" suponiendo la "unificacion bajo el sistema democratico y liberal" deviene el crimen nunca perdonable.
					
					 La RPDC ya declaro claramente que liquidara las cuentas hasta el final con los que cometan la provocacion de insultar la maxima dignidad y el sagrado sistema politico de ella.
					
					 Estaria muy equivocado si el nuevo presidente de la "Asamblea Nacional" piensa que podra salir ileso.

articles.title: Estrena en Pyongyang la banda militar central de Rusia
articles.content:
Estrena en Pyongyang la banda militar central de Rusia 
 Pyongyang, 26 de junio (ACNC) -- La banda militar central del Ministerio de Defensa de la Federacion Rusa, de visita en Corea, ofrecio el dia 26 su primera funcion en el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este. 
					 La vieron el teniente general del Ejercito Popular de Corea, Ryom Chol Song, el coronel general del EPC, Kim Hyong Ryong, el viceministro de Cultura, Han Chol, y los militares del EPC con el embajador Alexandr Timonin y otros miembros de la sede diplomatica rusa en Corea y los matrimonios de los representantes diplomaticos y los agregados militares de varios paises, acreditados en Corea. 
					
					 La banda famosa de Rusia presento en la escena las piezas que demuestran el aspecto del arte nacional, la idiosincrasia y las costumbres del pueblo ruso. 
					
					 El solo femenino "Panuelo azul" y "Katyusha" arrancaron efusiva ovacion por haber reflejado el aspecto optimista y el noble mundo espiritual de los militares del Ejercito Rojo y el pueblo patriotico que vencieron a los invasores fascistas y defendieron la patria. 
					
					 En las canciones coreanas "Cancion de la camaraderia" y "Encanto y veneracion", los ejecutantes describieron el gran respeto a los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il. 
					
					 La funcion llego al climax con la musica de instrumentos de viento "Vals de amistad", compuesta por el jefe del Servicio de Orquesta Militar de las Fuerzas Armadas de la Federacion Rusa y director general de la banda militar, Valery Khalilov.  
					
					 Continua la funcion.
					
					 Por la noche, el MINFAP ofrecio un banquete en honor de la banda militar rusa.
